title: Class DistanceGjk
content:
Class DistanceGjk

Namespace
Alis.Core.Physic.Collision.Distance
Assembly
Alis.dll

The Gilbert distance algorithm that provides the distance between shapes. Using Voronoi regions and Barycentric coordinates.

public static class DistanceGjk

GjkCalls

The number of calls made to the ComputeDistance() function. Note: This is only activated when Settings.EnableDiagnostics = true

public static int GjkCalls { get; set; }

Property Value

int

GjkIter

The number of iterations that was made on the last call to ComputeDistance(). Note: This is only activated when Settings.EnableDiagnostics = true

public static int GjkIter { get; set; }

Property Value

int

GjkMaxIter

The maximum number of iterations calls to the Distance() function. Note: This is only activated when Settings.EnableDiagnostics = true

public static int GjkMaxIter { get; internal set; }
